joi.any.empty: {{label}} is not allowed to be empty
joi.any.default: {{label}} threw an error when running default method
joi.alternatives.base: {{label}} not matching any of the allowed alternatives
joi.array.includes: {{label}} at position {{pos}} does not match any of the allowed types
joi.array.includesSingle: {{label}} single value of '{{!label}}' does not match any of the allowed types
joi.array.includesRequiredBoth: {{label}} does not contain {{knownMisses}} and {{unknownMisses}} other required value(s)
joi.array.excludes: {{label}} at position {{pos}} contains an excluded value
joi.array.excludesSingle: {{label}} single value of '{{!label}}' contains an excluded value
joi.array.hasKnown: {{label}} does not contain at least one required match for type '{{!patternLabel}}'
joi.array.hasUnknown: {{label}} does not contain at least one required match
joi.array.max: {{label}} must contain less than or equal to {{limit}} items
joi.array.orderedLength: {{label}} at position {{pos}} fails because array must contain at most {{limit}} items
joi.array.ref: {{label}} references '{{ref}}' which is not a positive integer
joi.array.sparse: {{label}} must not be a sparse array
joi.binary.base: {{label}} must be a buffer or a string
joi.binary.max: {{label}} must be less than or equal to {{limit}} bytes
joi.date.base: {{label}} must be a number of milliseconds or valid date string
joi.date.min: {{label}} must be larger than or equal to '{{limit}}'
joi.date.max: {{label}} must be less than or equal to '{{limit}}'
joi.date.isoDate: {{label}} must be a valid ISO 8601 date
joi.date.timestamp.javascript: {{label}} must be a valid timestamp or number of milliseconds
joi.date.timestamp.unix: {{label}} must be a valid timestamp or number of seconds
joi.date.ref: {{label}} references '{{ref}}' which is not a date
joi.function.minArity: {{label}} must have an arity greater or equal to {{n}}
joi.function.maxArity: {{label}} must have an arity lesser or equal to {{n}}
joi.lazy.base: !!schema error' : '{{label}} azy schema must be set
joi.lazy.schema: !!schema error' : '{{label}} azy schema function must return a schema
joi.object.max: {{label}} must have less than or equal to {{limit}} children
joi.object.missing: {{label}} must contain at least one of {{peersWithLabels}}
joi.object.xor: {{label}} contains a conflict between exclusive peers {{peersWithLabels}}
joi.object.oxor: {{label}} contains a conflict between optional exclusive peers {{peersWithLabels}}
joi.object.rename.multiple: {{label}} cannot rename child '{{from}}' because multiple renames are disabled and another key was already renamed to '{{to}}'
joi.object.rename.override: {{label}} cannot rename child '{{from}}' because override is disabled and target '{{to}}' exists
joi.object.rename.regex.multiple: {{label}} cannot rename children {{from}} because multiple renames are disabled and another key was already renamed to '{{to}}'
joi.object.rename.regex.override: {{label}} cannot rename children {{from}} because override is disabled and target '{{to}}' exists
joi.number.min: {{label}} must be larger than or equal to {{limit}}
joi.number.max: {{label}} must be less than or equal to {{limit}}
joi.number.precision: {{label}} must have no more than {{limit}} decimal places
joi.number.ref: {{label}} references '{{ref}}' which is not a number
joi.string.min: {{label}} length must be at least {{limit}} characters long
joi.string.max: {{label}} length must be less than or equal to {{limit}} characters long
joi.string.token: {{label}} must only contain alpha-numeric and underscore characters
joi.string.regex.base: {{label}} with value '{{!value}}' fails to match the required pattern: {{pattern}}
joi.string.regex.name: {{label}} with value '{{!value}}' fails to match the {{name}} pattern
joi.string.regex.invert.base: {{label}} with value '{{!value}}' matches the inverted pattern: {{pattern}}
joi.string.regex.invert.name: {{label}} with value '{{!value}}' matches the inverted {{name}} pattern
joi.string.uriRelativeOnly: {{label}} must be a valid relative uri
joi.string.uriCustomScheme: {{label}} must be a valid uri with a scheme matching the {{scheme}} pattern
joi.string.isoDate: {{label}} must be a valid ISO 8601 date
joi.string.hexAlign: {{label}} hex decoded representation must be byte aligned
joi.string.base64: {{label}} must be a valid base64 string
joi.string.dataUri: {{label}} must be a valid dataUri string
joi.string.normalize: {{label}} must be unicode normalized in the {{form}} form
joi.string.trim: {{label}} must not have leading or trailing whitespace
joi.string.ref: {{label}} references '{{ref}}' which is not a number
joi.string.ip: {{label}} must be a valid ip address with a {{cidr}} CIDR
